Hello, my name is

Rudra Savjani

Graphic Designer

  • Email
  • Behance
  • Linkedin

About Me

Rudra Savjani an enthusiastic Graphic Designer with a knack for marketing who is in love with creativity!

I design Professional & Beautiful Graphics

With years of experience in graphic and web design I have mastered the skills of understanding client requirements according to the latest trends. I have worked with businesses from different niches so you can rely on me for yours.

I’ve spent most of these years working across different areas of design like Logos and Branding, front-end development, landing pages, app UI/UX to my current role designing products for mobile platforms. Having worked on various projects that are already live, I can help you with the best possible suggestions and ideas that we can proceed with. With me, you aren’t forced to accept anything. I give you a variety of options we can work on together.

What I do

Logo And Branding

If you are looking for attention driving Logo and Branding Designs to attract more customers, I can help you design and build a platform with the latest and trendiest look and feel.

UI/UX Design

An effective UI/UX is what captures attention and spreads a clear message. I make sure the design is innovative and neat with all of this.

Photoshop

If you are looking for a Photoshop expert who’ll edit, enhance your photo to the greatest extent, I am a well-established professional to help you with this.

My Experience

2015-2017
Design It

Junior Graphic Designer

I was a part of an amazing design team and worked together with them to help design and develop various graphics like logos, flyers, brochures, websites etc. for different clients of the company.

2017-2020
ACoDez

Web Developer

I was responsible for many of the in-house and client-based web development assignments. I take pride in having helped the best of clients and getting maximum ratings for the company.

2020-Present
Buttercup Advertising Studio

Lead UI/UX Designer

I have responsibly led a team of 12 designers to help, supervise and approve their designs to make sure it matches client expectations and latest design standards.
